projects.name: servoshell
projects.description: First-party browser UI built with egui

projects.name: Verso
projects.description: A browser UI for Servo that implements the UI as HTML using Servo's own web rendering support

projects.name: Servo Qt
projects.description: A Servo Webview as Qt widget, enabling browser UI built in Qt

projects.name: Moto
projects.description: A fork/extension of servoshell that aims to add features such as bookmarks, history and download management

projects.name: Servo GTK
projects.description: A GTK4 library that embeds the Servo web engine

projects.name: Slint Servo
projects.description: Integrate Servo Web Engine as WebView Component for Slint to render websites

projects.name: Blitz
projects.description: An HTML renderer and application runtime built on top of Stylo

projects.name: Servo plugin for Apache Cordova
projects.description: A plugin that makes a Cordova app use a Servo based WebView

projects.name: Lightpanda
projects.description: A headless web browser that uses html5ever for parsing

projects.name: Wry Backend
projects.description: A Servo backend for Wry, the webview library used by Tauri
